name: Mace Break (DiffusionLabs)
description:
You've been captured and put into prison. You are only given a mace and chain. Use the mace as your weapon to escape the prison. 

On your way to escape you'll find some coins. In total there are 19 coins to collect. The coins do nothing gameplay wise and are just there for completionists. Controls: WASD / Arrow Keys - Move Mouse - Move mace around Left Mouse Button - Continue / Skip dialog

Credits: Programming, Art - RCJ15 Music, Sound Effects - Musehive Additional Ideas - R41ndrop12, Arin Eakins

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together"  https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021
